nodes.bodyText: Changed these logs to trace level because they have not been useful for debugging and create a lot of noise at debug level
This makes sure that if the User has checked filterByProject that they have to specify either a project name pattern or select a project.

There is an odd difference between validation of new jobs and existing jobs. For new jobs the UI will include empty fields in the validation request and they get validated but editing a job does not do the same. If the project name pattern or configured projects have no values, they are not included in the payload for the validate request.
